title: Can curiosity ever be a bad thing as it relates to the human condition? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is a fine line between curiosity and stupidity. Humans love the adrenaline rush of doing all things. Curiosity leads to knowledge. Humans would be much better off without knowledge. Ignorance is Bliss. That is why humans are such miserable animals. Curiosity, ignorance, and stupidity have as many losers as it does winner.
